DOC.brief_summary: we propose this study and try to find out possible clinical applicable non-invasive imaging indices or its combination with the laboratory indices to predict the status of hepatic fibrosis in BA patients.
DOC.brief_title: the Correlation Between Non-invasive Indicators in Patients With Biliary Atresia
DOC.criteria: pathological proved diagnosis of biliary atresia, and without other distinct abnormality or malformations. All had undergone Kasai portoenterostomy. All of them received abdominal MRI study. absence of laboratory data required.
